summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4496 for the improvement of the alley in block 21, D.T. Denny's North Seattle Addition, being the alley from West Harrison Street to West Thomas Street, between Queen Anne Avenue and 1st Avenue West, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52825, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
